column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Coming to this place is always a treat
column2: though I can't always afford it as a college student. At the risk of sounding pretentious
column3: I'm pretty particular about my coffee. Though I'm not sure if their coffee is my favorite
column4: the lavender latte is my go to. Very light and fragrant. All the pastries I've had are pretty good. I just recently had their soft scrambled parmesan eggs as well--came with fresh slices of baguette to smear it on. So yummy
